entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: A wizard and father of Fred and George Weasley.

entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: A village near Hogwarts where students are allowed to visit on weekends.

entities.name: fred and george weasley
entities.description: Twin brothers of Mr. Weasley and friends of Harry.

entities.name: honeydukes
entities.description: A sweet shop in Hogsmeade village.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley had warned Harry about the dangers of magical objects that can think for themselves.
Harry used the map to try and get into Hogsmeade village.
Fred and George Weasley had been using the map for years without any problems.
Harry used the secret passage on the map to get to Honeydukes.
